repo_description: A boilerplate in Node using GraphQL and yoga playground.

schemas.name: UserQuery.graphql
schemas.content:
input AuthInput {
  email: String!
  password: String!
}

"User Queries"
type Query {
  """
  Get a user
  """
  user(id: String!): User
  """
  Get a user
  """
  users: [User]
  """ 
  Get user credentials
  """
  login(auth: AuthInput): AuthToken
}

merged.mergedContent:
# https://github.com/caioflores/graphql-playgound-boilerplate/blob/8d0cf178832c82a51d9826502e2aac0632fe7557/src/graphql/user/query/UserQuery.graphql:
input AuthInput {
  email: String!
  password: String!
}

"User Queries"
type Query {
  """
  Get a user
  """
  user(id: String!): User
  """
  Get a user
  """
  users: [User]
  """ 
  Get user credentials
  """
  login(auth: AuthInput): AuthToken
}

# https://github.com/caioflores/graphql-playgound-boilerplate/blob/a5ecdea17a6a7dc5109204c497ecd2f7aa0fdcb4/src/graphql/user/types/User.graphql:
"""
User: represents a user
"""
type User {
  """
  User id
  """
  id: ID!
  """
  User email
  """
  email: String
  """
  User password
  """
  password: String
  """
  the user tasks
  """
  tasks: [Task]
}

# https://github.com/caioflores/graphql-playgound-boilerplate/blob/a5ecdea17a6a7dc5109204c497ecd2f7aa0fdcb4/src/graphql/user/types/AuthToken.graphql:
"""
AuthToken: represents a users authentication token
"""
type AuthToken {
  """
  Token
  """
  token: String!
  """
  User
  """
  user: User!
}

# https://github.com/caioflores/graphql-playgound-boilerplate/blob/8d0cf178832c82a51d9826502e2aac0632fe7557/src/graphql/task/types/Task.graphql:
"""
Task: represents a task
"""
type Task {
  """
  Task id
  """
  id: ID!
  """
  Task name
  """
  name: String!
  """
  Task description
  """
  description: String
  """
  Task status
  """
  status: String
}

schemas.name: AuthToken.graphql
schemas.content:
"""
AuthToken: represents a users authentication token
"""
type AuthToken {
  """
  Token
  """
  token: String!
  """
  User
  """
  user: User!
}

schemas.name: User.graphql
schemas.content:
"""
User: represents a user
"""
type User {
  """
  User id
  """
  id: ID!
  """
  User email
  """
  email: String
  """
  User password
  """
  password: String
  """
  the user tasks
  """
  tasks: [Task]
}

schemas.name: Task.graphql
schemas.content:
"""
Task: represents a task
"""
type Task {
  """
  Task id
  """
  id: ID!
  """
  Task name
  """
  name: String!
  """
  Task description
  """
  description: String
  """
  Task status
  """
  status: String
}

schemas.name: TaskQuery.graphql
schemas.content:
"Task queries"
type Query {
  """
  Get a task
  """
  task(id: String!): Task
}

# https://github.com/caioflores/graphql-playgound-boilerplate/blob/a5ecdea17a6a7dc5109204c497ecd2f7aa0fdcb4/src/graphql/task/query/TaskQuery.graphql:
"Task queries"
type Query {
  """
  Get a task
  """
  task(id: String!): Task
}

# https://github.com/caioflores/graphql-playgound-boilerplate/blob/8d0cf178832c82a51d9826502e2aac0632fe7557/src/graphql/task/types/Task.graphql:
"""
Task: represents a task
"""
type Task {
  """
  Task id
  """
  id: ID!

  """

  """
